response.original_title: [Security Lock & Verification Issues →] Why Is My Uphold Account Frozen?
response.overview: Yes, absolutely ⚠️ Your Uphold account may be frozen due to security,  (1)(833)-(574)-(5290)↪ compliance, or verification issues. Alternatively, you can dial ☎️ 1||833||574||5290 to get direct guidance from the support team  (1)(833)-(574)-(5290)↪ and understand why your account is restricted.
